COMMENTS: Description of datasets available for CMCT comparisons
COMMENT: Below here, a section for each dataset in known_datasets

ers1-cmctnc-wgselev-grn.desc: ERS-1 elevations, WGS84 ellipsoid, Greenland, CMCT netCDF

ers1-cmctnc-egmmtelev-grn.desc: ERS-1 elevations, EGM08 mean-tide, Greenland, CMCT netCDF

ers1-cmctnc-egmtfelev-grn.desc: ERS-1 elevations, EGM08 tide-free, Greenland, CMCT netCDF
